archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.1.8c: c) communicated to all employees and external individuals (e.g. consultants, contractors and employees of external parties) with access to the organisation's information or systems
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
